message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to let it go for $100. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $100 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider $90?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand it's a bit above your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $95. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $95 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $85?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob! I'm willing to compromise further and offer it to you for $92. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $92 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $88?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $89. What do you think?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum, but I'm still trying to save as much as I can. Would you be willing to go down to $87?
I'm really close to my minimum, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $88.5. What do you think?
I understand you're really close to your minimum, but I'm still trying to save as much as I can. Would you be willing to go down to $86?
